2035

Color Grading   Cinematography   
'2035' is a short film shot in February 2020, on which I was director of photography and colourist. Our very small budget forced us to plan everything very carefully, but we ultimately managed to create a consistent universe of greys, greens, and blues - except for some flashback scenes which are more intense reds and browns.
